structuredData.name: Merge or Split PDF files
structuredData.description: Quickly merge multiple PDFs or split a PDF by page ranges.

step.name: Choose action
step.text: Switch between Merge or Split tabs.

step.name: Upload PDFs
step.text: For merge, add 2+ PDFs. For split, upload one PDF and optionally set ranges (e.g., 1-3,5).

step.name: Download
step.text: Download the merged PDF or each split part.
